title: Stage makeup: youthful roles
creator_credit: Frangor Films and Coronet Instructional Films
brief_description: Effective make-up is an important part of developing a character on stage. In this film, two young people are shown making up for ingenue andjuvenile roles. They demonstrate step by step what make-up to use and the proper techniques for applying it.
